meanings.definition: A device that emits a fine spray of liquid.
meanings.sent1: The atomizer sprayed a mist of perfume into the air.
meanings.sent2: I used the atomizer to spray water on the plants.
meanings.sent3: The atomizer decided to have a water fight with the hose.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like an atomizer, spreading rumors throughout the school.
meanings.sent5: The atomizer hummed softly as it released the refreshing mist.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that atomizes.
meanings.sent1: The scientist was an expert atomizer, breaking down substances into tiny particles.
meanings.sent2: The machine acted as an atomizer, turning solid into spray.
meanings.sent3: The atomizer at the party was the one who made everyone laugh with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was an atomizer, dispersing inspiration to all around her.
meanings.sent5: The atomizer of ideas, he transformed complex concepts into simple explanations.
